multiple_choice.question: What kind of farmer was Farmer Boggis?
What food did Farmer Bunce eat every day?
Which farmer was the cleverest of the three?

short_answer.question: Why was Farmer Boggis fat?
short_answer.answer: Because he ate three boiled chickens with dumplings every day.

short_answer.question: What made Farmer Bean different from the others?
short_answer.answer: He was very thin and drank gallons of cider instead of eating food.

options: Under a huge tree in the wood
multiple_choice.answer: Under a huge tree in the wood

short_answer.question: Why is Mr Fox able to steal animals from the farms without being caught?
short_answer.answer: Because he approaches with the wind in his face, which helps him smell the farmers and avoid detection.

short_answer.question: What plan does Bean suggest to catch Mr Fox?
short_answer.answer: He suggests hiding outside Mr Fox's hole and waiting for him to come out, then shooting him.

Where are the farmers waiting for Mr. Fox?
What does Mr. Fox see shining behind a tree?
What do the farmers do after shooting at Mr. Fox?

short_answer.question: Why does Mr. Fox decide to come out of his hole?
short_answer.answer: He notices the shiny surface and hears a noise, so he cautiously checks outside.

short_answer.question: What do the farmers hope to do after missing Mr. Fox?
short_answer.answer: They plan to dig him out of his hole.

short_answer.question: How long might it take for Mr. Fox to come out again?
short_answer.answer: It may take at least three days before he gets hungry enough to come out.

Because the shovels were digging into their hole

What was the main reason Mrs. Fox was worried?
options: They would run out of food

short_answer.question: Why was Mr. Fox unable to sleep after his tail was injured?
short_answer.answer: Because he was in pain from his injured tail.

short_answer.question: What did Mr. Fox realize he could do to escape the danger?
short_answer.answer: He realized that a fox can dig faster than a man and decided to dig a tunnel to escape.

short_answer.question: How did Mrs. Fox show her love and appreciation for Mr. Fox?
short_answer.answer: She praised him as a fantastic fox and expressed her love for him.

multiple_choice.answer: Topple the big tree and dig the hill

multiple_choice.question: What do the foxes think is happening underground?

short_answer.question: What is Bean's plan to catch the fox?
short_answer.answer: He wants to use mechanical shovels and machines to dig him out.

short_answer.question: How do the foxes realize the danger they are in?
short_answer.answer: They see daylight and hear the noise of the tractors, understanding the tunnel is collapsing.

short_answer.question: What is the mood of the story during the tractor attack?
short_answer.answer: The mood is tense and chaotic as the machines destroy the hill and threaten the foxes.

multiple_choice.answer: They became more furious and obstinate

options: You will never come around my farm again
We’re going to catch the fox
multiple_choice.answer: You will never come around my farm again

short_answer.question: Why did the crowd come to see the hill?
short_answer.answer: They came to see the large hole made by the machines and the effort to catch the fox.

short_answer.question: How did the farmers feel at the end of the story?
short_answer.answer: They were more furious and determined not to give up until they caught the fox.

short_answer.question: What plan do the men have to catch the fox?
short_answer.answer: They plan to starve the fox out by camped watching the hole until he comes out.

short_answer.question: Why were Bean and the others angry at the fox?
short_answer.answer: Because the fox was causing trouble for them and they wanted to catch him.

short_answer.question: What did Mr. Fox say he could smell from a mile away?

multiple_choice.answer: He found wooden planks above their heads

What was inside the chicken house?

short_answer.question: Why did Mr. Fox not tell the children where they were going?
short_answer.answer: Because it was a wonderful place that would make them crazy with excitement, and if they knew, they might get disappointed if they couldn't reach it.

short_answer.question: What strategy did Mr. Fox use to catch chickens?
short_answer.answer: He carefully climbed into the chicken house, pushed up the floorboards, and quietly caught three hens to take back.

short_answer.question: What should the children do after catching the chickens?
short_answer.answer: They should take the chickens back to their mother and prepare a feast.

short_answer.question: Why is Badger worried about the situation on the hill?
short_answer.answer: Because half the wood has disappeared, men with guns are everywhere, and they can't get out or find food.

short_answer.question: What does Mr. Fox plan to do to help the animals?
short_answer.answer: He plans to have a feast and use the tunnel to escape from the farmers.

short_answer.answer: He tells Badger everyone is invited, and they will share the chickens and have a good time.

short_answer.question: Why do the Small Foxes and Badger rush to help Mr. Fox load the food?
short_answer.answer: Because they are hungry and excited about the delicious food they are stealing.

short_answer.question: How does Mr. Fox ensure that their theft remains a secret?
short_answer.answer: He carefully puts the floorboards back into place so no one can see they were moved.

short_answer.question: What is the main reason Mr. Fox wants to take only a few choice items from Bunce’s storehouse?
short_answer.answer: To avoid being caught and to keep their theft a secret.

short_answer.answer: They went into the cellar to find the secret cider stash.

short_answer.answer: Rat used a rubber tube to suck out the cider from the jar.

short_answer.question: What effect did the cider have on Mr. Fox, Badger, and the Smallest Fox?
short_answer.answer: They found the cider to be very strong and delicious, and it made them feel excited and happy.

short_answer.question: Why did Mr Fox and the animals decide to run away?
short_answer.answer: Because the woman was coming into the cellar and might see them.

short_answer.question: What happened to the fox's tail?
short_answer.answer: It was shot to pieces and ruined.

short_answer.question: What does Mr Fox say about Rat's behavior?
short_answer.answer: He tells Rat to stay out of their place and not to come back.

multiple_choice.question: What did Mr Fox and the animals find at the end of the tunnel?

options: They are searching for more food
They are afraid of outside enemies

multiple_choice.answer: They are afraid of outside enemies

multiple_choice.question: What did Mr Fox propose to the other animals?
options: To leave and find new homes
To stay in the tunnel forever
To build a new village above ground
multiple_choice.answer: To stay in the tunnel forever

multiple_choice.question: Who was thanked for saving the animals' lives?

short_answer.question: What did Mr Fox say about the outside world?
short_answer.answer: He said the outside is full of enemies and they hate going out, only doing so to find food.

short_answer.question: How did the animals react after the feast?
short_answer.answer: They cheered, hugged each other, and celebrated the idea of staying safe in their tunnel home.

short_answer.question: What are Mr Fox's plans for the future?
short_answer.answer: He plans to make a little underground village with houses for each animal and go shopping every day to eat like kings.
